Package fr.insalyon.messenger.net.mongodb

Class MongoDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.insalyon.messenger.net.mongodb.MongoDB
  • public class MongoDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows to handle request with the mongoDB database
